snippet.title: KHATYRKA: Prelude Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100320/KHATYRKA_Prelude/

“Gadzhi, are you above shooting a man in the back these days?”

KHATYRKA: Prelude is a narrative third-person shooter that follows the story of Gadzhi, a military defector who must cross the vast and hostile Khatyrka Steppe in escape of his former comrades. Explore the vast, arid steppe on horseback and survive intense combat encounters.

Credit to Videezy.com for the ember effect at the end of the trailer
